page.title: 14Games at School and Home 1
page.content:
Six people in our class did a survey to see what games children like best. Two looked at games children played indoors at home. Two more looked at games children played outdoors at home and two looked at playground games in school. This is what they found out.
Our part of the survey was on games children play indoors at home. We found out that computers were the most popular, then it was Lego and third was the pocket computers. Other games children play at home include car toys, Meccano, dolls, card games, subbeteo football and chess.
We looked at games children played outside at home.The activity which was themost popular was swimming. Bicycling, football and roller skating were also popular.
